name: The Thousand Seasons Of Kyumori Episode1 LITE
name_original: The Thousand Seasons Of Kyumori Episode1 LITE
description:
Kyumori which has received high evaluation in various parts of the world appears as the trial free LITE version!!! The LITE version has restrictions in the characters and the game modes which can be chosen.

On this LITE version, I want you to try the correctness of the collision judging. I think that punches and kicks do not narrowly hit the enemy just in front of him. On the product, you can try whether a punch and a punch really collide.

※The following is the explanation of the product.
The most real 3D collision judging in the 3D fighting games on the iOS!!!

This app is a 3D graphics fighting game of the unique characters which have not been once!!! To realize rich game experience, the various functions and features are loaded.

・features
- The unique characters which have not been once in fighting games.
- The leading real 3D collision judging in iOS 3D fighting games. A punch and a punch collide in the 3D space.
- Local communication battles are possible between iPhones, iPodTouches or iPads.
- Three kinds of UIs are possible to be used. Only flick operation is also possible.
- In the watch mode, a computer plays battles automatically.
- Various config setups. It's possible to change freely the position and the size of a controller and buttons.
- Supported the Retina display.
